attributes.action: campaign to change the Irish flag
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Irish flag is offensive to Unionists as the orange is a claim on the Unionist community.

It is about time that the Prime Minster did something for the Unionist community and stopped pandering to Nationalist/Republican elements.

If the Republic of Ireland can drop their territorial claim to Northern Ireland from their constitution, then they can cange their flag.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
